# Training – High Impact Business Communication Training for English Speakers

**Contract No.**: WS4209079582
**Contract Title**: Training – High Impact Business Communication Training for English Speakers
**Solicitation No.**: WS4209079582
**Publication Date**: September 19, 2023

## Tender Information

*   **Closing Date**: October 5, 2023, 2:00 PM (EDT)
*   **Tender status**: Expired
*   **Regions of delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   **Contracting entity name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **PMCs Direct Contact Information**

Contact for Procurement: Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la/ she-her)
Phone: None
Email: <jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>

## Procurement Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to provide high-impact business communication training for English speakers.

## Procurement Details

*   **Procurement category**: Services to Government - Team
*   **Tender type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement method**: Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Price-based selection criteria**: Lowest Price


## Trade Agreements Applied
The procurement is covered under several trade agreements:
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

Please note that this job has expired. Original doc belonged to the contractor not the supplier (so asking them to re-cycle) hence the date appears to the past. 


All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 5, 2023, at 2 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.



The job seeks a qualified service provider to provide training for government staff on high-impact business communication for English-speaking personnel. Please note that this is an updated version of the original notice, with an amended tender closing date of October 5, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.



Refer to the official government website for the latest information.  [government website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17490828?extsite=MTc0OTEw
